name: Unknown
line: It's Lucas, I think he's in trouble.

name: Unknown
line: Do you remember how he said he was looking for the gate?

name: Mike
line: Yeah. - What if he found it?

name: Unknown
line: I don't know, he's way out of range.

name: Unknown
line: Lucas, if you can hear us, slow down. We can't understand you.

name: Lucas
line: Yes, I copy! Do you? They know about Eleven! Get out of there! They know about Eleven! The bad men are coming! All of them! Do you hear me? The bad men are coming!

name: Unknown
line: "Mad hen." Does that mean anything to you? Like a code name or something?

name: Lucas
line: The bad men are coming! - "Bad men."

name: Unknown
line: Well, I know she and Steve have been spending some time together, so I thought maybe...

name: Unknown
line: Well, is he home? Maybe you could ask him?

name: Unknown
line: I'm sorry, can you just hold on, please? Michael, I'm on the phone. I've told you a million times...

name: Mike
line: Is there anyone supposed to come and do repairs on the house?

name: Unknown
line: I don't understand. Is there something wrong...

name: Mike
line: No, Mom, nothing's wrong in the house.

name: Mike
line: We need to leave... right now.

name: Mike
line: If anyone asks where I am, I've left the country.

name: Dustin
line: Go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go!

name: Unknown
line: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.

name: Unknown
line: Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God.

name: Dustin
line: Dustin, do you copy? Yeah, Lucas, they're on us.

name: Lucas
line: Meet me at Elm and Cherry!

name: Unknown
line: I don't know. - I think we lost them.

name: Unknown
line: Faster, faster! Shit, shit, shit, shit, shit!

name: Unknown
line: Did... did you see what she did to that van?

name: Lucas
line: Everything I said about you being a traitor and stuff... I was wrong. I'm sorry.

name: Jonathan
line: Jesus, what... what happened? - I'm fine.

name: Callahan
line: Well, your boy assaulted a police officer. That's why.

name: Callahan
line: I am afraid I cannot do that.

name: Unknown
line: Take them off! - You heard her. Take 'em off.

name: Unknown
line: Chief, I get everyone's emotional here, but there's something you need to see.

name: Unknown
line: Why don't you ask your son? We found it in his car.

name: Jonathan
line: What? - Why are you going through my car?

name: Unknown
line: Is that really the question you should be asking right now? I wanna see you in my office.

name: Unknown
line: Why don't you give me a try?

name: Karen
line: I don't understand. You think my son is hiding this girl?

name: Unknown
line: We just need to know if you've seen her in the past week.

name: Unknown
line: Our son with a girl? I mean, believe me, if he had a girl sleeping in this house, we'd know about it. Wouldn't we?

name: Unknown
line: This girl... what has she done?

name: Unknown
line: I'm afraid I can't answer that.

name: Karen
line: Oh, my God, is she Russian?

name: Unknown
line: You can't treat us like this. I need you to stay calm.

name: Karen
line: You come into my house, and you tell me that my son is hiding some girl, and that he's in danger, but you can't tell us why? And you, what, you expect me to remain, what, calm?

name: Unknown
line: I understand how upsetting this is. I wish we could tell you more... but I can tell you that your son, Michael, is in real danger.

name: Unknown
line: We want to help him. We will help him. I give you my word.

name: Unknown
line: But in order for me to do that... you have to trust me.

name: Unknown
line: Now... do you have any idea where your son might have gone?

name: Lucas
line: This is Randolph Road, right here. The fence starts here, and goes all the way around. And this is the lab right here. The gate's gotta be in there somewhere. It's gotta be.

name: Dustin
line: Department of Energy? What do you think that means?

name: Mike
line: Just trust me, all right? It's military. My dad's told me before.

name: Unknown
line: Mike's right. There's soldiers out front.

name: Dustin
line: Do they make, like, lightbulbs or something?

name: Mike
line: No, weapons... to fight the Russians, and commies and stuff.

name: Dustin
line: Oh, Jesus, this is bad. Really bad. The place is like a fortress.

name: Mike
line: I don't know, but we can't go home. We're fugitives now.

name: Dustin
line: Go, go, go, go, go, go!

name: Joyce
line: You say blood draws this thing?

name: Unknown
line: We don't know. It's just a theory.

name: Joyce
line: What, you're sorry? You're... you're sorry? That is not good enough, Jonathan. That's not even close. That's not even in the... in the ballpark.

name: Jonathan
line: I wanted to tell you, I just... I thought I could save Will... I still do.

name: Joyce
line: What if this thing took you, too? You risked your life... and Nancy's. This is not yours to fix alone. You act like you're all alone out there in the world, but you're not. You're not alone.

name: Joyce
line: God damn it, Jonathan. - Damn it.

name: Troy's mom
line: Where is the chief? I want to speak to him right this instant.

name: Callahan
line: Stay here. Ma'am, I need you to calm down.

name: Troy's mom
line: Name and badge number, both of you!

name: Unknown
line: What the hell is going on here?

name: Troy's mom
line: These men are humiliating my son.

name: Unknown
line: No, no, no. Okay, that's not true. - Yes.

name: Unknown
line: There was some kind of fight, Chief...

name: Troy's mom
line: A psychotic child broke his arm! - A little girl, Chief. A little one.

name: Unknown
line: That tone! Do you hear that tone?

name: Unknown
line: Honestly, I'm just trying to state a fact. - It was a little girl...

name: Unknown
line: I don't have time for this. Will you please take a statement... and get her out?

name: Unknown
line: So what'd this girl look like?

name: Troy
line: She had no hair and she was bleeding from her nose. Like a freak.

name: Troy
line: I said she's a freak! Her head's shaved. She doesn't even look like a girl.

name: Troy
line: She can... do things. Like... make you fly. And piss yourself.

name: Troy
line: She always hangs out with those losers.

name: Unknown
line: Don't worry, he'll need more than aspirin when we're done with him.

name: Unknown
line: Yeah, if the creep ever gets out. The cops should just lock him up forever.

name: Unknown
line: Did you see the look on his face?

name: Unknown
line: He probably had that same look whenever he killed his brother, right?

name: Unknown
line: Oh, God, I just got an image of him making that face while he and Nancy are screwing.

name: Carol
line: Carol, for once in your life, shut your damn mouth!

name: Steve
line: You're both assholes. That's my problem.

name: Unknown
line: Are you serious right= right now, man?

name: Steve
line: Yeah, I'm serious. You shouldn't have done that. - Done what? You know what.

name: Unknown
line: You mean call her out for what she really is? Oh, that's funny, because I don't remember you asking me to stop.

name: Steve
line: I should've put that spray paint right down your throat. - You know, neither of you ever cared about her. You never even liked her, because she's not miserable like you two. She actually cares about other people.

name: Carol
line: The slut with a heart of gold.

name: Steve
line: I told you to watch your mouth! Hey! I don't know what's gotten into you, man, but you don't talk to her that way.

name: Unknown
line: - Or what? Or what? You gonna fight me now, too? Huh? You gonna fight me now, too? Because you couldn't take Jonathan Byers... so I wouldn't recommend that.

name: Unknown
line: Here, let me get the door for you, buddy.

name: Unknown
line: That's right. Run away, Stevie boy! Run away! Just like you always do. That Nancy's turning you into a little pussy!

name: Unknown
line: - That's right, Harrington, run away! Run away!

name: Nancy
line: My mom... my dad are there.

name: Nancy
line: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. - Let go.

name: Unknown
line: Let go! - Hey! Listen to me. Listen to me.

name: Unknown
line: The last thing in the world we need is them knowing you're mixed up in all this.

name: Unknown
line: They haven't found him. Not yet, at least.

name: Unknown
line: Come on, get in the car.

name: Unknown
line: Look, we need to find them before they do. Do you have any idea where he might have gone?

name: Nancy
line: No, I don't. - I don't know. We haven't talked a lot. I mean, lately...

name: Unknown
line: Is there any place that your... your parents don't know about that he might go?

name: Unknown
line: I might. - I don't know where he is, but I think I know how to ask him.

name: Nancy
line: Mike, are you there? Mike? Mike, it's me, Nancy. Mike, are you there? Answer. Mike, we need you to answer.

name: Nancy
line: This is an emergency, Mike. Do you copy? Mike, do you copy?

name: Lucas
line: She said it was an emergency.

name: Dustin
line: What if the bad people kidnapped her? What if they're forcing her to say this?

name: Nancy
line: I need you to answer. We need to know that you're there, Mike.

name: Hopper
line: Listen, kid, this is the chief. If you're there, pick up. We know you're in trouble and we know about the girl.

name: Unknown
line: Why is she with the chief?

name: Dustin
line: How the hell does he know about...

name: Hopper
line: We can protect you, we can help you, but you gotta pick up. Are you there? Do you copy? Over.

name: Mike
line: Yeah, I copy. It's Mike. I'm here. We're here.

name: Unknown
line: Did you have something to do with this?

name: Karen
line: They expect us to just sit here like prisoners. We should be out there looking for him.

name: Unknown
line: Honey, we have to trust them, okay? This is our government. They're on our side.

name: Karen
line: That man gives me the creeps.

name: Unknown
line: Nancy. You don't think she's involved in this, too, do you?

name: Dustin
line: It's been way too long. Do you know what? Maybe you're right. Maybe this is all a trap and the bad men are coming to get us right now!

name: Lucas
line: It's not a trap. Why would the chief set us up? Nancy, maybe, but the chief?

name: Lucas
line: Would you shut up about Lando?

name: Dustin
line: I don't feel good about this. I don't feel good about this! When do you feel good about anything?

name: Hopper
line: All right, let's go. Let's go!

name: Nancy
line: Mike. Oh, my God. Mike! I was so worried about you.

name: Mike
line: Okay, so, in this example, we're the acrobat. Will and Barbara, and that monster, they're this flea. And this is the Upside Down, where Will is hiding. Mr. Clarke said the only way to get there is through a rip of time and space.

name: Dustin
line: That we tracked to Hawkins Lab.

name: Mike
line: With our compasses. Okay, so the gate has a really strong electromagnetic field, and that can change the directions of a compass needle.

name: Hopper
line: How do you know all that?

name: Joyce
line: Is there any way that you could... that you could reach Will? That you could talk to him in this...

name: Nancy
line: And my friend Barbara? Can you find her, too?

name: Mike
line: Whenever she uses her powers, she gets weak. The more energy she uses, the more tired she gets.

name: Lucas
line: Like, she flipped the van earlier.

name: Joyce
line: Well... How do we make her better?

name: Mike
line: We don't. We just have to wait and try again.

name: Eleven
line: I can find them. In the bath.

name: Unknown
line: Hey, you know how paru did that? You know what that is?

name: Unknown
line: Melted plastic and microwaved bubble gum.

name: Unknown
line: Do you want me to pause it?

name: Unknown
line: I'm sure it's just a wrong number.

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, yeah. I just, I... I have a science question.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: It's ten o'clock on Saturday. Why don't we pick this up...

name: Dustin
line: Do you know anything about sensory deprivation tanks? Specifically how to build one?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Sensory deprivation? What is this for?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Okay. Well... Why don't we talk about it Monday? After school, okay?

name: Dustin
line: You always say we should never stop being curious. To always open any curiosity door we find.

name: Dustin
line: Why are you keeping this curiosity door locked?

name: Dustin
line: Uh-huh. - Uh-huh. How much? - Uh-huh. Yep, all right. Yeah, we'll be careful. Definitely. All right, Mr. Clarke. Yeah, I'll see you on Monday. I'll see you on Monday, Mr. Clarke. Bye.

name: Dustin
line: Do you still have that kiddie pool we bobbed for apples in?

name: Dustin
line: Yeah. Good. Then we just need salt. Lots of it.

name: Hopper
line: Well, where are we gonna get that much salt?

name: Nancy
line: Hey, wait. It's not gonna snow next week, is it?

name: Nancy
line: Even if we find Will in there... what are we gonna do about that thing?

name: Jonathan
line: We're not gonna do anything. I don't want you anywhere near this, all right? Your mom's been through enough already.

name: Jonathan
line: Listen to me. I'm gonna find him. All right? You gotta trust me on this. I am going to find him.

name: Lucas
line: Come on. It's upside down. - No, this way.

name: Unknown
line: Okay, um... How does this even work?

name: Lucas
line: Try that side. - Son of a bitch!

name: Unknown
line: Pull it back. Pull it back.

name: Mike
line: Candy, leftovers, Eggos... She really likes Eggos.

name: Nancy
line: I knew you were acting weird. I just... I thought it was because of Will.

name: Mike
line: I knew you were acting weird, too. I thought it was 'cause of Steve.

name: Nancy
line: Hey... No more secrets, okay? From now on we tell each other everything.

name: Mike
line: Okay. Do you like Jonathan now?

name: Nancy
line: What? No. - No, it's... it's not... it's not like that.

name: Joyce
line: This will keep it dark for you. Just like in your bathtub.

name: Joyce
line: You're a very brave girl. You know that, don't you? Everything you're doing for my boy... for Will... for my family... Thank you.

name: Joyce
line: Listen. I am gonna be there with you the whole time. And if it ever gets too scary... in that place, you just let me know, okay?

name: Nancy
line: Is Barb okay? Is she okay?

name: Eleven
line: Gone! Gone! Gone! Gone! Gone! Gone!

name: Joyce
line: It's okay. It's okay. It's okay.

name: Joyce
line: It's okay. It's okay. - Hey. It's okay. It's okay, we're right here. We're right here, honey.

name: Joyce
line: It's okay. I got you. Don't be afraid. I'm right here with you. I'm right here with you. It's okay. It's okay. It's okay, you're safe. You're okay, honey.

name: Joyce
line: You tell him... tell him I'm coming. Mom is coming.

name: Eleven
line: Your mom... she's coming for you.

name: Joyce
line: Okay. Listen, you tell him to... to stay where he is. We're coming. We're coming, okay? We're coming, honey.

name: Unknown
line: Just... just hold on a little longer.

name: Hopper
line: So this fort. Where is it?

name: Jonathan
line: Uh, it's in the woods behind our house. Yeah, he used to go there to hide.

name: Hopper
line: No, I'm... Look, if something happens to me, I don't make it back...

name: Nancy
line: Yeah, but then I'll go. You stay.

name: Joyce
line: He's my son, Hop. My son. I'm going!

name: Hopper
line: Now, listen, I need you to stay here...

name: Joyce
line: Please, I need you to stay, Jonathan. - Please. I'm gonna find him. I'm gonna find him.

name: Nancy
line: We have to go back to the station.

name: Nancy
line: Your mom and Hopper are just walking in there like bait. That thing is still in there. And we can't just sit here and let it get them, too. We can't.

name: Jonathan
line: You still wanna try it out?

name: Nancy
line: I wanna finish what we started. I want to kill it.

name: Hopper
line: So this is your plan? - Worked for me before, didn't it?

name: Unknown
line: I'd like to hear your thoughts on the war.

name: Unknown
line: I think we're dealing with a whole different environment here.

name: Unknown
line: I'll tell you what, we always planned on the Russians massing the fire and we...

name: Unknown
line: - Don't move! - All right, move in.

name: Will
line: ♪ If I go there will be trouble ♪ And if I stay it will be double ♪ So, come on and let me know ♪ Should I stay or should I go now? ♪
